title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Recent events may remind you to reevaluate how much you can trust people in your world. You might struggle with your thoughts and emotions about an important relationship today. However, you must also be sure that youre not projecting your own issues onto someone else. Its easy to build up your expectations about who a person is rather than really knowing their true nature. Invest more time and energy into understanding each other better before making any final decisions. Giving others the benefit of the doubt now leads to a more rewarding future. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
